kv8.9:40.10_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv8.9:40.12_0: The account of the form of work is finished.
kv8.9:40.4_0: “Ānanda, that silly man, when asked him like this,
kv8.9:40.5_0: ‘After doing an intentional deed to be experienced as pleasant by way of body, speech, or mind, one feels pleasure.
kv8.9:40.6_0: If a deed to be experienced as painful by way of body, speech, or mind, one feels pain.
kv8.9:40.7_0: If an intentional deed to be experienced as neutral by way of body, speech, or mind, one should rightly reply. That way to rightly know a neutral feeling.”
